SEARCH
Package gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming

Class SuperHttp

java.lang.Object
gr.aueb.dmst.onepercent.programming.SuperHttp
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
ManagerHttp, MonitorHttp
public class SuperHttp extends Object implements HttpInterface
Class: SuperHttp is a superclass that contains static variables, used in other classes, representing the docker client and the http requests. It is used to create a docker client and the http requests. SuperHttp class implements the HttpInterface interface. It is the superclass of the MonitorHttp class and ManagerHttp class.
See Also:
  • HttpInterface
  • MonitorHttp
  • ManagerHttp
